@smolnar82 There are 18 builds in the queue before this one, so I don't think it makes sense to wait for another check to complete.  Previous ones failed for unrelated reasons.
@oleewere Can you please review, too?  Thanks.

Test FAILed.
Test FAILured.
You are correct, i wasn't aware that the second zeppelin stands for the user. Changed the scripts to load the username from configuration and use that to construct the correct pid file.
as pointed out in #305, the zeppelin-user can be configured - so this should be taken into account when checking for the pid-file

You need to add the new constraint during upgrade via the appropriate UpgradeCatalog class.
No upgrade work is being done for Ambari 3.0 right now. That's a separate Jira to start when the bulk of changes to the DDL is completed.
ok.. thanks for the clarification.
